This is already fixed and in M8.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 110265 ***

The fix in M8 is till logging the FileNotfound exception to system out.
(Although it recovers and continues)
It should only be logged in the eclipse .log file.
this is in m8 and is in the org.eclipse.wst.common.modulecore plugin
